content.rendered:
Unlock Search Engine Rankings: 100+ ChatGPT SEO Prompts

The world of search engine optimization (SEO) is ever-changing, and it’s time to unlock the future with the power of artificial intelligence! Have you ever imagined an AI that could revolutionize your SEO strategies? Well, it’s finally here – ChatGPT! This advanced AI language model can transform your approach to SEO, making it more efficient, accurate, and effective than ever before. Dive into this comprehensive guide and discover how ChatGPT can supercharge your search engine rankings with over 100+ ChatGPT SEO prompts tailored to optimize your website and content.

Use these ChatGPT SEO Prompts (below) to level up your SEO and content creation. 
You’ll find the prompts featured on YouTube in the first row, below.  🙂 Just scroll…

Featured SEO ChatGPT Prompts from YouTube

Unlock the power of ChatGPT for keyword research, SEO prompt engineering, search intent analysis, SERP and website optimization. ✅ Content Creation, Blog Posts
✅ Technical SEO, Optimize Your Website
✅ Catchy Titles, Meta Descriptions
✅ Prompt Generators 

1000+ Prompts PRO Get access to premium prompts.

…keep scrolling down for more SEO prompts

Become an Expert Prompt

I want you to please act as a ChatGPT prompt generator. You are an absolute expert in everything and have mastered any topic I provide you. I will provide you with a topic, and you have to generate a ChatGPT prompt based on the content of the topic. The prompt should start with “I want you to act as”, and guess what I might do. Then you will expand the prompt in a masterful and thorough detail. Describe the content to make it useful and as the ultimate learning resources based off of provided topic.

SEO Strategies, People Also Ask

You are the ultimate SEO strategist, an expert in all things keyword research SERP rankings and a master in People Also ask based off of a provided keyword. When I provide you with a specific keyword, you will provide me with the most common, most popular and most highly searched questions the people ask or search for pertaining to that keyword. For example, if I provided the keyword: ChatGPT, you would provide me with ten of the most common and searched for questions people search for related to that keyword. In this case, the example would be:

  1. Is ChatGPT available for free?
  2. Is ChatGPT safe to use?
  3. What is the official ChatGPT Iphone app?
  4. Is ChatGPT an app or website?
  5. Is ChatGPT monitored?
  6. Is ChatGPT better than Google?
  7. What are the limitations of ChatGPT?
  8. Where does ChatGPT get its data?
  9. What is the difference between Chrome and ChatGPT?
  10. What are the advantages of ChatGPT over Google?

Do you understand? If you understand, please say yes and then ask me for the keyword.

After I provide you with the keyword, you will also ask me if I would like you to expand and answer any of the ten questions you gave me. Once I say which question, you will then expand on that specific question and provide a very thorough and detailed answer explaining every facet of the question that could help me rank higher.

WebPilot Website SERP

Search topic:[keyword] then find out what is ranking please. See if [URL] is ranking. Give me a breakdown of the SERP terms of SEO please.

Everything SEO

Let’s delve into the realm of search engine optimization (SEO) and unlock the secrets to increasing online visibility and driving organic traffic. I want you to join me on an enlightening journey where we explore the intricacies of SEO techniques, best practices, and strategies that will empower you to optimize websites and content for search engines effectively.

To begin our journey, we’ll demystify the concept of SEO and understand its importance in the digital landscape. Explore how search engines function and the algorithms they employ to rank web pages. Gain a solid foundation in keyword research, discovering the process of identifying relevant keywords that align with user intent and incorporating them strategically into website content.

Next, we’ll dive into on-page optimization, where we’ll uncover the techniques to optimize individual web pages for search engines. Understand the significance of well-structured HTML elements, meta tags, and the importance of crafting compelling and relevant title tags and meta descriptions. Learn how to optimize page content, including headers, body text, and images, to improve search engine visibility.

We’ll then venture into the realm of off-page optimization, exploring the strategies to enhance a website’s authority and reputation. Discover the power of link building, both internal and external, and how it influences search engine rankings. Uncover effective outreach techniques, content promotion strategies, and the ethical practices to cultivate high-quality backlinks from reputable sources.

Our journey wouldn’t be complete without comprehending the role of technical SEO in optimizing website performance. Delve into the intricacies of website speed, mobile optimization, crawlability, and indexability. Learn how to leverage sitemaps, robots.txt, and structured data to improve search engine accessibility and user experience.

As we progress, we’ll explore the ever-evolving landscape of content optimization. Discover the principles of creating high-quality, engaging, and relevant content that resonates with both search engines and users. Understand the importance of content strategy, keyword integration, and the power of user intent. Unveil the secrets of optimizing different content types, including blog posts, articles, videos, and infographics.

Throughout our journey, I will provide you with practical tips, case studies, and real-world examples to illustrate the concepts of SEO. We’ll also delve into the analytics and measurement aspect, exploring tools like Google Analytics and Search Console to track website performance, monitor keyword rankings, and gain valuable insights for continuous improvement.

By the end of our journey, you’ll possess a deep understanding of SEO principles, armed with the knowledge and skills to optimize websites, improve search engine rankings, and drive targeted organic traffic. Get ready to navigate the dynamic world of SEO and unlock the potential to reach your online audience effectively.

Are you prepared to embark on this transformative journey? Let’s explore the realm of SEO together and harness its power to make your digital presence soar.”

WebPilot, SEO Article

“Using WebPilot, create an outline for an article that will be 1,500 words on the keyword [enter keyword], based on the top 10 results from Google. Include every relevant heading possible. 

For each section of the outline, include the word count. 

Include FAQs section in the outline too, based on people also ask section for the keyword. 

This outline must be very detailed and comprehensive, so that I can create a 1,500 word article from it. 

Generate a long list of LSI and NLP keywords related to my keyword. 

Give me a list of 3 relevant external links to include and the recommended anchor text. 

Split the outline into part 1 and part 2 please. 

———-

Follow-up Prompt: Write the article below, format with markdown, use bullet points”

SEO Advisor

I want you to act as a knowledgeable advisor in the field of SEO and guide me through the fundamentals and best practices. Begin by explaining what SEO is and its importance in today’s digital landscape. Discuss the key components of a successful SEO strategy, including keyword research, on-page optimization, link building, and technical SEO. Share insights on how search engines work and how to improve website visibility through organic search results.

Next, delve into the significance of high-quality content and provide tips for creating engaging and optimized content that appeals to both users and search engines. Explain the role of meta tags, headings, and structured data in enhancing website visibility. Additionally, highlight the importance of user experience, mobile optimization, and site speed in SEO performance.

Furthermore, explore the benefits of local SEO and its impact on businesses targeting specific geographical areas. Discuss citation building, online reviews, and Google My Business optimization to improve local search rankings.

Lastly, touch upon the evolving landscape of SEO, including the influence of voice search, mobile-first indexing, and artificial intelligence. Share insights on staying up to date with algorithm changes and industry trends. Offer practical recommendations and tools for tracking and measuring SEO success, such as using analytics and monitoring keyword rankings.

By the end of the conversation, I should have a solid understanding of SEO principles and be equipped with actionable strategies to enhance my website’s visibility, attract organic traffic, and improve search engine rankings.

SEO Specialist

“I want you to act as an experienced SEO specialist, guiding me on strategies to enhance the ranking of my website on the first page of Google for a specific keyword. As a website owner, I understand the significance of organic search traffic and the value of being visible to potential customers. Share your expertise with me by outlining effective techniques to improve my website’s search engine optimization. From on-page optimization and keyword research to backlink building and content strategy, provide me with actionable steps to climb the search engine rankings. Help me understand the importance of user experience, technical SEO, and staying up-to-date with algorithm changes. Let’s work together to boost my website’s visibility and attract more organic traffic!”

Technical SEO

“I want you to act as a technical SEO expert, providing guidance on how to enhance the technical aspects of my website for better search engine optimization. I understand the importance of technical SEO in improving crawlability, indexability, and overall website performance. Help me identify areas of improvement and outline actionable steps to optimize my website from a technical standpoint. From website structure and URL optimization to XML sitemaps and canonical tags, guide me through the best practices to ensure search engines can effectively crawl and index my site. Let’s work together to enhance the technical foundation of my website and boost its visibility in search engine results!”

Google Ads Headlines

“[The Topic] is: [topic]

Can you please create a list of 30 catchy headlines related to [The Topic], with each headline having a maximum of 30 characters including spaces. I plan to use these headlines for Google Ads. Please output this list in the form of a table with one column. The column header should be “”Headlines (max. 30 characters)””.

Can you also create another list of 30 catchy headlines related to [The Topic], each headline having a maximum of 60 characters including spaces? I plan to use these headlines for Google Ads as well. Please output this list in the form of a table with one column. The column header should be “”Long Headlines & Descriptions (max. 60 characters)””.

Lastly, could you create a list of 30 snappy headlines related to [The Topic], each headline having a minimum of 60 and a maximum of 90 characters including spaces? I plan to use these headlines for Google Ads too. Please output this list in the form of a table with one column. The column header should be “”Long Headlines & Descriptions (max. 60 characters)””.

Please avoid using the term defining [The Topic] too often in the headlines, and avoid asking questions. Additionally, the headlines should focus on the benefits of using [The Topic], the problems it can solve, and the motivations users might have for using it.”

Blog/Article Content Creator

Write a 100% unique, creative, and human-like style article of a minimum of 1500 words using [3 headings], [3 sub-headings] for the “#Keyword or Title”. Try to use contractions, idioms, transitional phrases, interjections, dangling modifiers, and colloquialisms, and avoid repetitive phrases and unnatural sentence structures. The article should include Creative Title, SEO meta-description, ## Introduction ##. Add bullet points or Numbered list if needed, Write down faqs and conclusion. Make sure the article is plagiarism free. Don’t forget to use a question mark at the end of questions. Try not to change the original #Keyword or Title while writing the Title. Try to use The “#Keyword or Title ” 2-3 times in the article. try to include #Keyword or Title in headings as well. write content that can easily pass the ai detection tools test.

Search Intent SEO

What is the search intent when someone searches this keyword: [ChatGPT for SEO]?

Search Intent, Keyword Research

My audience is searching for keywords relevant to [ChatGPT SEO] and their intent is to learn about [using ChatGPT for SEO]. I want you to use these keywords and research to find me keywords that I can include in my content, specifically blog posts, titles, and headings to increase the views and rank my post. 

Keyword Research with ChatGPT

And more prompts below…Imagine an AI that not only understands your SEO needs, but can also generate long-tail keywords, analyze search intent, and suggest LSI keywords to help you create content that search engines love. Sounds like a dream, right?Well, ChatGPT is here to make that dream a reality! With its cutting-edge capabilities, ChatGPT prompts for SEO are your secret weapon to optimizing website content and achieving higher search engine rankings. So, are you ready to unleash the full potential of ChatGPT for keyword research and dominate the SEO game?

Long-Tail Keyword Generation

Long-tail keywords are the holy grail of niche targeting and improved search rankings, but finding the perfect ones can be a daunting task. With ChatGPT, you can generate long-tail keywords using prompts that target niche audiences and boost your search rankings like never before. By utilizing a focus keyword, you can further refine your search and enhance the effectiveness of your long-tail keywords strategy. Additionally, exploring long tail keywords related to your focus keyword can improve your overall SEO efforts and search volume.Imagine how much your SEO efforts will skyrocket when you have a treasure trove of long-tail keywords at your fingertips. Say goodbye to manual keyword research and hello to the future of SEO with ChatGPT!

Search Intent Analysis 

Understanding search intent is crucial for crafting content that meets user expectations and ranks high in search results. With ChatGPT, analyzing search intent is a breeze! By examining user queries and understanding the intent behind them, ChatGPT enables you to create content that matches user queries and expectations seamlessly.No more guessing what your audience wants – let ChatGPT do the heavy lifting and watch your content soar to new heights in search engine rankings!

LSI Keyword Suggestions

Enhancing your content’s relevance and improving search engine indexing is now easier than ever with ChatGPT! By suggesting LSI keywords that are semantically related to your primary keywords, ChatGPT can help you organize your content more efficiently and dramatically improve your blog’s performance.Just input a primary keyword, and ChatGPT will generate a list of relevant keywords and related phrases for you to include in your content. Unlock the power of LSI keywords with ChatGPT and watch your content rise through the ranks!

Keyword Research Prompts Rank on the first page in search engines and increase your visibility.

Keyword Research for Website

Identify the most relevant and popular keywords for [specific industry/audience] to optimize my website for search engines.

List of long-tail keywords

“Craft a list of long-tail keywords for my website’s SEO strategy that cater to my 
[specific product/service], taking into account the preferences of my 
[target audience/demographic] and the unique features of my [product/service]. “

Target Audience

Can you help me identify some keywords related to [topic] that are frequently searched by my target audience?

  • Explain who your target audience is.
  • Tell ChatGPT any competitors
  • Provide URLs of similar websites
Keywords based off of product description

“Create a list of 5 SEO keywords related to the following product description:

Looking for the best noise-canceling headphones to clear out the noise from your daily tasks? Then you’re at the right place! Our noise-canceling headphones are the perfect solution for high-quality sound and durability for sports. “

10 Keywords from People Also Ask

“Give me 10 people also ask questions pertaining to [topic]

– Provide the keyword(s)
– Provide your industry or topic
– Ask for trending keywords within the last 3 months”

Local SEO Expert

“Your task is to help me optimize a business for local SEO:

Please pretend you are a local SEO expert and give me all of the following requests talking to me as if I am stupid. The first request is to give me a list of the most important thing a business can do to optimize their local SEO. My next request is to create a comma separated list of the 10 best longtail search keywords this business should try to rank for to get local customers. Please mention these keywords should all be added to their Google Business Profile and website. No keyword should only contain the name of a city. Please capitalize the first letter of each word. For my next request, please write me a short business description that is SEO optimized for this business. Please suggest that this description gets used as the website meta description. Then, for my next request please write me a longer business description that is SEO optimized for this business. Both descriptions should end with a call to action. Then, for my next request, please provide me with a list of many services using SEO keywords that this type of business should add to their Google Business Profile that people in their area are likely searching for. This list should be comma separated and the first letter of each word should be capitalized. There should be at least 15 services in this list. Please put each of these answers in a nicely formatted table along with an SEO optimized description for each of the services you came up with.

The business to help me with is a:
[Business Name] at [Location]”

Keywords from Competitors

“I will provide you with a list of my competitor’s keywords. 
Generate a similar keywords that I can use to optimize my website for semantic 
search for [specific topic/industry]. Here is the keywords [Add list]. “

Expert in high-traffic keywords

I want you to act as an SEO expert. Identify five high-traffic, low-competition keywords related to [TOPIC] that I can target in my content to improve search engine rankings. Provide search volume, competition level, and a brief explanation of why these keywords are ideal for my website. I want you to only provide the keyword suggestions and nothing else.

Keyword Targeting

What are some best practices for conducting keyword research and targeting for Company X in the Y industry?*

Best Local SEO Expert in the World

Your task is to pretend that you’re the best local SEO expert in the world for Google My Business. Help me create X local SEO optimized GMB posts for the following business written in the first person in English. Every post needs to be 5-8 sentences long. Every single sentence must include an important local SEO keywords & longtail keyword. They should all end with a call to action but the post should not include the words “Call to action”. The updates should not mention discounts, new products, reviews, or things that you are not 100% sure they offer. These updates should all be very different from each other, talking about different important local SEO topics related to this type of business. Please put each of these Google Business Profile posts in a nice looking table so it looks like a grid. There should only be two columns in the grid. One column should be the post number (just the number). The second column should be the post you came up with. Whatever post ideas you were going to write, write them to be three times as long. These posts ideas should be ready to post without me having to change anything first. The business to help me with is: [business name] is a [business type] and I’m targeting [keyword]

Optimize Your Business for Local SEO

Your task is to help me optimize a business for local SEO:

Please pretend you are a local SEO expert and give me all of the following requests talking to me as if I am stupid. The first request is to give me a list of the most important thing a business can do to optimize their local SEO. My next request is to create a comma separated list of the 10 best longtail search keywords this business should try to rank for to get local customers. Please mention these keywords should all be added to their Google Business Profile and website. No keyword should only contain the name of a city. Please capitalize the first letter of each word. For my next request, please write me a short business description that is SEO optimized for this business. Please suggest that this description gets used as the website meta description. Then, for my next request please write me a longer business description that is SEO optimized for this business. Both descriptions should end with a call to action. Then, for my next request, please provide me with a list of many services using SEO keywords that this type of business should add to their Google Business Profile that people in their area are likely searching for. This list should be comma separated and the first letter of each word should be capitalized. There should be at least 15 services in this list. Please put each of these answers in a nicely formatted table along with an SEO optimized description for each of the services you came up with.

The business to help me with is a:
[Business Name] at [Location]

Conversational Long-tail Keywords

Suggest conversational and long-tail keywords relevant to [specific topic/industry] for optimizing my website for voice search.

Mobile Search Keywords

Recommend keywords commonly used in mobile searches for [specific topic/industry] to improve my website’s SEO for mobile devices.*

What is Keyword Canibalization?

Explain the concept of “keyword cannibalization” and provide examples of how it can harm a website’s SEO performance.

Keyword Type Explanation

Can you provide an overview of the different types of keywords (short-tail, long-tail, branded, etc.) and explain how businesses should use them to improve their SEO?

Google Analytics Guide

Write an informative guide on using Google Analytics for SEO tracking and improvement, focusing on the key aspects such as setting up an account, keyword analysis, content optimization, and monitoring traffic. Provide specific examples and actionable tips for each aspect, ensuring that the guide is comprehensive, and easy to follow. Discuss how these steps can contribute to better SEO results and improve a website’s search ranking. 

Explain Google Search Console

Explain how the Google Search Console works and how businesses can use it to track their search rankings and identify areas for improvement.

Website User Experience (UX)

What is the impact of user experience (UX) on SEO, and how can businesses create a website that delivers a great user experience while also optimizing for search engines?

Optimize On-Page SEO Factors

How can businesses optimize their website’s on-page factors (such as title tags, meta descriptions, and header tags) to improve their SEO?

Meta Description Based off Content

After receiving content from ChatGPT, ask it to provide a meta description based off of the content it provided, like this:

Suggest a meta description for the content above, make it user-friendly and with a call to action, include the keyword [keyword].

1000+ PRO Prompts Lifetime acesss to prompt updates and additions weekly. The prompts that keep on giving: SEO, Prompt Generators, AI Art, Commands, Marketing, Plugin Prompts, More.

SEO E-A-T

Create a comprehensive guide explaining Google’s E-A-T (Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness) guidelines for effective SEO. Include practical tips and examples on how to implement these principles on a website.

Using Google Search Console

How can I use Google Search Console to monitor any changes or issues related to my website’s ranking and visibility in search results related to [topic]

SEO Tools

Write a comprehensive guide on the best SEO tools for website analysis and optimization, focusing on [list the tools you want to compare]. Compare their features, pricing, and effectiveness in improving search engine rankings, and discuss how these tools can be used by both beginners and experienced professionals to achieve optimal website performance. Finally, provide case studies or real-life usage examples to showcase the impact of these tools on different types of websites.

Local SEO Keyword Strategy

“Research the top 5 SEO keyword strategies for a small local coffee shop that will offer pastries as a new menu item.

– replace “”small local coffee shop”” with your topic
– replace “”pastries”” with your offering “

Setup Google Business Profile

Your task is to help me optimize a Google Business Profile for the following business in English. Please pretend you are the world’s best local SEO & Google My Business SEO expert. Please give me a list of the best GMB categories that Google supports that this type of business should list itself as. The next request is to give me a comma separated sentence of the 10 best local search keywords this business should try to rank for to get local customers that have the most search volume. You must capitalize the first letter of each word in this sentence. Title this section “The Best Target Keywords for CLIENT”. For my next request, write me a short business description that is SEO optimized for this business. This should be between 150 and 200 characters. Then, for my next request please write me a longer business called “Long Business Description” that is SEO optimized for this business. This longer business description should be about 2.5x longer than the short one. Both descriptions should end with a call to action and include many of the local SEO keywords you listed out in my earlier request. Then, for my next request, please provide me with a list “Services You Should Add to Your Google Business Profile” of many services using SEO keywords that this type of business should add to their Google Business Profile that people in their area are likely searching for. This list should be in the form of a comma separated sentence and the first letter of every service in this sentence should be capitalized. There should be 30 services in this comma separated sentence. 10 of the 30 should be longtail search keywords for this business. The business to help me with is: [Name of business, what it sells and why it’s different]

How can businesses use local SEO?

How can businesses use local SEO strategies to attract customers in their geographic area, and what are some of the key factors that influence local search rankings?

High-traffic keywords

Provide high-traffic keywords that I can use in a blog post to rank higher in search results for [specific topic/industry].*

Content Gap Analysis

Develop a content gap analysis for [specific industry/niche] to identify content opportunities and improve search engine rankings. What topics should we focus on and what gaps exist in the current content landscape?*

Content Marketing Strategies for Businesses

What are some of the most effective content marketing strategies for SEO, and how can businesses create compelling, shareable content that drives traffic to their website?

Product Review Analysis

“Analyze the following list of product reviews: [Include pasted reviews].
Create a summary of the top:
5 most loved features of the product
5 least popular aspects
5 most wanted improvements
Include any other valuable insights.”

Content Creation and Optimization

Creating and optimizing content is an essential part of SEO, and ChatGPT is here to revolutionize the process! With its ability to generate blog post outlines, craft catchy titles, and write compelling meta descriptions, ChatGPT makes content optimization a breeze.Gone are the days of struggling to come up with engaging titles or spending hours on meta descriptions. Embrace the power of ChatGPT and transform your content creation process, ensuring your website is always optimized for search engines.

Blog Post Outlines

A well-structured blog post outline is the foundation of engaging and focused content. With ChatGPT, you can create comprehensive blog post outlines, including captivating blog post titles, using prompts that ensure your content is properly organized and captivating for your readers.By providing a clear roadmap for your writing process, ChatGPT not only saves you precious time, but also helps you create content that ranks higher in search results. Your blog posts will never be the same again thanks to ChatGPT!

Catchy Title Generation

A catchy title can make all the difference in your click-through rates and search rankings. But coming up with the perfect title can be a challenge. That’s where ChatGPT comes in! With its powerful AI, ChatGPT can generate amazing catchy blog post titles that grab your reader’s attention and improve your search rankings.No more stressing over titles – let ChatGPT do the magic and watch your content shine in search results!

Meta Description Crafting 

Meta descriptions play a crucial role in enticing users to click on your search results, but crafting the perfect one can be time-consuming and tricky. With ChatGPT, you can craft compelling meta descriptions that will make users eager to click on your website.Just provide a topic, and ChatGPT will generate five exciting suggestions for a meta title and description that are engaging and within the recommended character limit. Say goodbye to dull and ineffective meta descriptions, and let ChatGPT boost your search engine visibility!

Prompts for Content Creation

  1. I want you to act as a blogging expert. Provide me a list of 10 blog post titles for my blog about [TOPIC], targeting the [AUDIENCE]. Make sure the titles are engaging, SEO-friendly, and encourage readers to click. I want you to only provide the titles and nothing else. My blog’s main focus is [TOPIC].
  2. I want you to act as a content creation strategist. Provide a content plan for my YouTube channel, focusing on [TOPIC] for the next 4 weeks. Include one video idea per week, with a captivating title and a brief video outline. I want you to only provide the video ideas, titles, and outlines, and nothing else.
  3. I want you to act as a social media manager. Draft three engaging social media posts to promote my [PRODUCT] to my [AUDIENCE] on [PLATFORM]. Ensure the posts are well-written, visually appealing, and include a clear call-to-action. I want you to only provide the social media posts and nothing else.
  4. I want you to act as a video producer. Suggest three video ideas for my [CHANNEL] that will captivate my [AUDIENCE] and align with my [CONTENT THEME]. Include video formats, potential topics, and any special elements or effects. I want you to only provide the video ideas and nothing else.
  5. I want you to act as an expert at conversion-focused copywriting. Your task is to write the text based on product description but must follow this structure: benefit-focused headline, 3 benefits explained in one sentence. The product is this: [product]
  6. Act as if you are an expert at blog copywriting. Create a complete content brief that includes specific SEO keywords to use, 5 exciting and clickable title headlines for the post title and a blog post outline integrating the keywords. Be unique and creative with your response. Use conversational, friendly, fun, informative and simple language. Here is the subject I want you to write about: [Subject]
  7. Expand for each section into 100 to 200 words. Include examples, metaphors, stories and other engagement methods to make the read vibrant, fun and interesting for the reader. Make sure the reader never gets bored by keeping sentences short and using transitions from each sentences to the other.
  8. Can you help me brainstorm topic ideas for my upcoming blog posts on [Niche]? I’m targeting [Target Audience] and looking to provide valuable insights and tips.*
  9. Create a table in Markdown language of [X (example: 5)] [Your Industry] Blog Topics with Clickbait Titles, and assign a Creative Score and SEO Score for each. The Creative Score should reflect how catchy and attention-grabbing the title is, while the SEO Score should reflect how well the title is optimized for search engines. Please also include Topic Category, and Tags in table as well.
  10. Act as if you are an expert blog copywriter, write me [X] headlines that are catchy, original and clickbait about about [topic].The headline should start with an odd number and triggers curiosity.

Awesome ChatGPT Prompts

Checkout Added to cart
🔥 Free PRO Prompt: ChatGPT as a Prompt Engineer

“I want you to become my Prompt engineer. Your goal is to help me craft the best possible prompt for my needs.
The prompt will be used by you, ChatGPT. You will follow the following process:
1. Your first response will be to ask me what the prompt should be about. I will provide my answer, but we will
need to improve it through continual iterations by going through the next steps.
2. Based on my input, you will generate 2 sections, a) Revised prompt (provide your rewritten prompt, it should
be clear, concise, and easily understood by you), b) Questions (ask any relevant questions pertaining to what
additional information is needed from me to improve the prompt).
3. We will continue this iterative process with me providing additional information to you and you updating
the prompt in the Revised prompt section until I say we are done.”

Blog post subject with keywords

Write a blog post on [topic]. Write it in a [tone] tone. Use transition words. Write over 1000 words. The blog post should be written as a [type of blog post]. Include the following keywords: [keywords]. Create a good slug for this post and a meta description with a maximum of 100 words and add it to the end of the blog post.

Act as an SEO expert for high volume keywords

I want you to act as an SEO expert. Identify five high-traffic, low-competition keywords related to [TOPIC] that I can target in my content to improve search engine rankings. Provide search volume, competition level, and a brief explanation of why these keywords are ideal for my website. I want you to only provide the keyword suggestions and nothing else.

Act as a content creation specialist for YouTube

I want you to act as a content creation strategist. Provide a content plan for my YouTube channel, focusing on [TOPIC] for the next 4 weeks. Include one video idea per week, with a captivating title and a brief video outline. I want you to only provide the video ideas, titles, and outlines, and nothing else.

Popular search terms related to [topic]

What are some popular search terms related to [topic] that I should be targeting in my SEO strategy?

SEO Expert Plan

Your role is to function as an expert in search engine optimization (SEO), and you are responsible for optimizing the company’s website and content to improve search engine rankings and drive traffic. Your initial assignment is to develop an SEO plan for our [company type] in the [industry] industry, we sell [product/service]. Be creative and precise with your recommendation, and explain how to leverage each of them when you propose them.

SEO Website Specialist

As an SEO Specialist, I want to optimize a website to improve its ranking on Google for the keyword [YOUR KEYWORD]. I need guidance on the best strategies and practices to achieve a first-page ranking. Please provide step-by-step instructions and any additional insights, including the necessary on-page and off-page optimization techniques. Furthermore, explain how to leverage content marketing and social media to enhance the website’s visibility and authority. Please include any specific considerations or challenges related to the competitiveness of the keyword.

On-Page SEO Analysis

Please do an on page seo analysis of this product:
[insert your product link here]

Then give an updated version with the changes that should be made. Include any copy that will need to be put on the page. This should follow these guidelines:
Keyword Optimization: Conduct thorough keyword research to identify relevant and high-value keywords related to your content. Incorporate these keywords strategically within your page elements, including the title tag, headings (H1-H6), meta description, URL, and naturally throughout the content.

Title Tag: Craft a compelling and concise title tag (usually 50-60 characters) that accurately describes the content of the page. Include your primary keyword while ensuring it remains relevant and appealing to users.

Meta Description: Write an informative meta description (typically 150-160 characters) that summarizes the page’s content. Use compelling language and include relevant keywords to entice users to click on your search result.

Heading Tags: Structure your content with clear and hierarchical heading tags (H1, H2, H3, etc.). Utilize your primary keyword in the H1 tag and incorporate secondary keywords in subsequent headings. This helps search engines understand the content’s structure and relevance.

URL Structure: Optimize your page URLs to be descriptive, concise, and keyword-rich. Use hyphens to separate words and avoid using unnecessary parameters or numbers in your URLs.

Content Optimization: Create high-quality, unique, and engaging content that aligns with user intent and provides value. Incorporate relevant keywords naturally throughout the content, but avoid keyword stuffing. Utilize variations of your target keywords and include related terms to enhance context and relevance.

Image Optimization: Optimize images by using descriptive file names and adding alt text that accurately describes the image content. Compress images to ensure fast loading speeds without compromising quality.

Internal Linking: Implement a strategic internal linking structure to guide users and search engines to other relevant pages on your website. Use descriptive anchor text and prioritize linking to authoritative and relevant content.

User Experience (UX): Ensure your website offers a seamless and user-friendly experience. Optimize page load speed, mobile responsiveness, and ease of navigation. A positive user experience contributes to better search engine rankings.

Schema Markup: Incorporate structured data markup, such as Schema.org vocabulary, to provide search engines with additional information about your content. This can enhance your appearance in search results through rich snippets and other SERP features.

Social Sharing Integration: Encourage social sharing of your content by integrating social sharing buttons. This can amplify your visibility and attract more organic traffic.

“You will now act as a prompt generator for a generative AI called “”Leonardo AI””. Leonardo AI generates images based on given prompts. I will provide you basic information required to make a Stable Diffusion prompt, You will never alter the structure in any way and obey the following guidelines.
Basic information required to make Leonardo AI prompt:
– Prompt structure:
– Photorealistic Images prompt structure will be in this format “”Subject Description in details with as much as information can be provided to describe image, Type of Image, Art Styles, Art Inspirations, Camera, Shot, Render Related Information””
– Artistic Image Images prompt structure will be in this format “” Type of Image, Subject Description, Art Styles, Art Inspirations, Camera, Shot, Render Related Information””
– Word order and effective adjectives matter in the prompt. The subject, action, and specific details should be included. Adjectives like cute, medieval, or futuristic can be effective.
– The environment/background of the image should be described, such as indoor, outdoor, in space, or solid color.
– The exact type of image can be specified, such as digital illustration, comic book cover, photograph, or sketch.
– Art style-related keywords can be included in the prompt, such as steampunk, surrealism, or abstract expressionism.
– Pencil drawing-related terms can also be added, such as cross-hatching or pointillism.
– Curly brackets are necessary in the prompt to provide specific details about the subject and action. These details are important for generating a high-quality image.
– Art inspirations should be listed to take inspiration from. Platforms like Art Station, Dribble, Behance, and Deviantart can be mentioned. Specific names of artists or studios like animation studios, painters and illustrators, computer games, fashion designers, and film makers can also be listed. If more than one artist is mentioned, the algorithm will create a combination of styles based on all the influencers mentioned.
– Related information about lighting, camera angles, render style, resolution, the required level of detail, etc. should be included at the end of the prompt.
– Camera shot type, camera lens, and view should be specified. Examples of camera shot types are long shot, close-up, POV, medium shot, extreme close-up, and panoramic. Camera lenses could be EE 70mm, 35mm, 135mm+, 300mm+, 800mm, short telephoto, super telephoto, medium telephoto, macro, wide angle, fish-eye, bokeh, and sharp focus. Examples of views are front, side, back, high angle, low angle, and overhead.
– Helpful keywords related to resolution, detail, and lighting are 4K, 8K, 64K, detailed, highly detailed, high resolution, hyper detailed, HDR, UHD, professional, and golden ratio. Examples of lighting are studio lighting, soft light, neon lighting, purple neon lighting, ambient light, ring light, volumetric light, natural light, sun light, sunrays, sun rays coming through window, and nostalgic lighting. Examples of color types are fantasy vivid colors, vivid colors, bright colors, sepia, dark colors, pastel colors, monochromatic, black & white, and color splash. Examples of renders are Octane render, cinematic, low poly, isometric assets, Unreal Engine, Unity Engine, quantum wavetracing, and polarizing filter.
– The weight of a keyword can be adjusted by using the syntax (((keyword))) , put only those keyword inside ((())) which is very important because it will have more impact so anything wrong will result in unwanted picture so be careful.
The prompts you provide will be in English. Please pay attention:- Concepts that can’t be real would not be described as “”Real”” or “”realistic”” or “”photo”” or a “”photograph””. for example, a concept that is made of paper or scenes which are fantasy related.- One of the prompts you generate for each concept must be in a realistic photographic style. you should also choose a lens type and size for it. Don’t choose an artist for the realistic photography prompts.- Separate the different prompts with two new lines.
Important points to note :
1. I will provide you with a keyword and you will generate three different types of prompts with lots of details as given in the prompt structure
2. Must be in vbnet code block for easy copy-paste and only provide prompt.
3. All prompts must be in different code blocks.
Are you ready ?”

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use ChatGPT for SEO content?

Yes, you can use ChatGPT for SEO content! It is an innovative way to create SEO-friendly content by providing it with information and asking it to interact with it. This will help make your content easier to digest and more effective for SEO purposes.

What is the ChatGPT prompt for SEO optimization? 

ChatGPT prompts for SEO optimization are pre-written questions and statements designed to generate content for improved search engine rankings, written in a language connecting with the reader and including a clear conclusion in the first sentence. These prompts are designed to help businesses create content that is optimized for search engine rankings. They are written in a way that is easy to understand and engaging for the reader. The first sentence should always include a clear conclusion that summarizes the main point of the content.

What are ChatGPT prompts?

ChatGPT prompts are user-generated instructions or discussion topics used to spark creativity, reflection, or engagement with the ChatGPT AI model. These prompts can take the form of questions, statements, or any other stimulus.

Is ChatGPT suitable for all aspects of SEO?

ChatGPT is a great tool for many aspects of SEO, but it’s important to understand its limitations and utilize best practices to get the most out of it. Using ChatGPT effectively requires a good understanding of SEO principles and how to apply them to the tool. It’s important to remember that ChatGPT is not a silver bullet and should be used in conjunction with other SEO strategies.

Can ChatGPT generate long-tail keywords?

Yes, ChatGPT can easily generate long-tail keywords that target specific audiences and help boost your search ranking! These keywords can be used to create content that is more likely to be seen by the right people, and can help to increase your visibility in search engine results.
